title: #196: TFH's Book of The Month "1984" with Gordon Rochford
description:
Thank you for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Those Conspiracy Guys' Gordon Rochford to discuss the first book in the monthly Tin Foil Hat Book Club, 1984! I hope you will join us in our journey to learn more about the world around us by reading a new book every month and drink from the fountain of knowledge.

June's Tin Foil Hat Book Of The Month:
Confessions Of An Economic Hitman by John Perkins.

Tin Foil Hat Live:
June 14th: Hyena's Plano
https://www.prekindle.com/promo/id/97934110429491172
June 15th: The Secret Group
http://www.thesecretgrouphtx.com/event/1837804-tin-foil-hat-comedy-live-houston/
June 21st-23rd: Skankfest Brooklyn
https://www.skankfestnyc.com
